text: Hey kids.
Can you help me with some spelling?
Here we go!

It's an ant it's an ant ant ant ant
It's an ant it's an ant a-n-t
It's an ant it's an ant a-n-t
How do you spell ant?
a-n-t
Wow! Can you tell me what it is kids?
That's right it's a rat.

It's a rat it's a rat rat rat rat
It's a rat it's a rat r-a-t
It's a rat it's a rat r-a-t
How do you spell rat?
r-a-t

Can you guess what this is kids?
That's right it's a yak

It's a yak it's a yak yak yak yak
It's a yak it's a yak y-a-k
It's a yak it's a yak y-a-k

How do you spell yak?
y-a-k

What's that kids? Have you seen one before?
That's right it's an elk

It's an elk it's an elk elk elk elk
It's an elk it's an elk e-l-k
It's an elk it's an elk e-l-k

How do you spell elk?
e-l-k
What's that kids? That's right it's a bug

It's a bug it's a bug bug bug bug
It's a bug it's a bug b-u-g
It's a bug it's a bug b-u-g

How do you spell bug?
b-u-g
Good job kids!
Can you spell these words by yourself?
Lets try!

It's an ant it's an ant ant ant ant
It's an ant it's an ant a-n-t
It's an ant it's an ant a-n-t

How do you spell ant? 
a-n-t
That's great! Keep going! This time it's a rat

It's a rat it's a rat rat rat rat
It's a rat it's a rat r-a-t
It's a rat it's a rat r-a-t

How do you spell rat? 
r-a-t

Great job kids. You guys are really good at this.
Next up, it's a yak

It's a yak it's a yak yak yak yak
It's a yak it's a yak y-a-k
It's a yak it's a yak y-a-k

How do you spell yak?
y-a-k
That's great. This time let's spell elk. Here we go!

It's an elk it's an elk elk elk elk
It's an elk it's an elk e-l-k
It's an elk it's an elk e-l-k

How do you spell elk?
e-l-k
Okay, we're almost there. One more. It's a bug

It's a bug it's a bug bug bug bug
It's a bug it's a bug b-u-g
It's a bug it's a bug b-u-g

How do you spell bug?
b-u-g
That was great everyone
Thanks for helping me with my spelling.
And don't forget to subscribe!
